title: Tyrant eSports Recruiting TOP Laner [Diamond 2+]

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Tyrant eSports (@TYRANTESPORTSAU). Australian based eSports organisation. Business enquirers please email esportstyrant@gmail.com. Australia

body:
Tyrant eSports have recently undertaken changes to management roles and are currently looking to recruit a starting TOP laner to join our T1 roster.

We understand that many players currently have University exams are are scarce on playing at the moment, but if you fit the criteria please apply!

Before contacting us please make sure you meet the requirements:

* Diamond 2+
* Working Mic / Discord
* Available for practice at least 3 times per week
* Are able to adapt to the meta and play relevant champs that the team requires
* The ability to vocalise information to the team
* Willingness to take feedback from the team in a constructive way

If you are interested in trailing please contact "Luser" or "Mind" in game

Tyrant eSports.
